key_skills: JobRequirement(skill='Technical Ski Knowledge', importance='Critical', description='Deep understanding of ski technique, equipment, and racing', category='Technical')
JobRequirement(skill='Performance Analysis', importance='High', description='Ability to analyze athlete performance and provide feedback', category='Analytical')
JobRequirement(skill='Team Leadership', importance='High', description='Experience leading and motivating elite athletes', category='Leadership')
JobRequirement(skill='International Experience', importance='High', description='Experience with World Cup, Olympics, international competitions', category='Experience')
JobRequirement(skill='Equipment Management', importance='Medium', description='Knowledge of ski preparation and maintenance', category='Technical')
JobRequirement(skill='Sports Psychology', importance='Medium', description='Understanding of mental preparation and motivation', category='Psychology')
JobRequirement(skill='Physical Conditioning', importance='Medium', description='Knowledge of fitness and conditioning for skiers', category='Fitness')
JobRequirement(skill='Communication Skills', importance='High', description='Ability to communicate with athletes, staff, and officials', category='Soft Skills')
JobRequirement(skill='Multilingual Skills', importance='Medium', description='Ability to work in international environments', category='Language')
JobRequirement(skill='Safety Management', importance='Critical', description='Ensuring athlete safety in high-risk sport', category='Safety')
industry_standards: IndustryStandard(aspect='Experience', requirement='Minimum 10+ years', best_practice='International competition experience preferred', source='FIS Guidelines')
IndustryStandard(aspect='Education', requirement='Sports Science Degree', best_practice='Physical Education or Sports Coaching degree', source='Academic Standards')
IndustryStandard(aspect='Certifications', requirement='FIS Coaching License', best_practice='International coaching certifications', source='FIS Requirements')
IndustryStandard(aspect='Languages', requirement='English + Local', best_practice='Multilingual capability for international work', source='International Standards')
IndustryStandard(aspect='Technical Skills', requirement='Ski Equipment', best_practice='Expert knowledge of ski preparation', source='Technical Standards')
IndustryStandard(aspect='Leadership', requirement='Team Management', best_practice='Proven ability to lead elite teams', source='Leadership Standards')

common_mistakes: Too much text, not enough achievements
